label: Long-Term Unemployment
universe: Civilian labor force 16 years and over
definition: Workers unemployed for 27 weeks or longer...

label: Discouraged Workers
universe: Population 16 years and over not in labor force
definition: People not in labor force who want to work but have given up looking...

label: Underemployment Rate
universe: Civilian labor force 16 years and over
definition: Workers employed part-time for economic reasons plus unemployed...

label: Economic Mobility Index
definition: Measure of income movement between quintiles over time...

label: Minimum Wage Workers
universe: Population 16 years and over with earnings
definition: Workers earning at or below federal minimum wage...

label: Service Worker Earnings (Tip-Based)
definition: Median earnings for workers in food service occupations...
